head.title: Hillary Simmers To Wed in May

hedline.hl1: Hillary Simmers To Wed in May

block.p: Mrs. R. Thomas Sour of Rye, N.Y., has announced May wedding plans for her daughter, Hillary Trehare Simmers, and Philip Livingston Kennedy, a son of Mr. and Mrs. Moorhead C. Kennedy Jr. of New York.

Miss Simmers, 29 years old, is a sales representative for Country Floors in New York. She was presented at the Westchester Cotillion in 1980 and graduated from Boston University and Sotheby's Decorative Arts School in London. Her mother, Jean P. Sour, is an interior designer in Rye. The prospective bride's father is Hugh Simmers of Darien, Conn.

Mr. Kennedy, 31 and a graduate of the University of Vermont, is an options trader at William B. Maher Associates on the American Stock Exchange. His mother, Louisa Livingston Kennedy, is a real estate broker at Stribling & Associates in New York. His father, who was one of the American hostages held at the United States Embassy in Teheran for 444 days, is the executive director of the Moorhead Kennedy Institute of the American Forum, an international consulting group in New York.

Mr. Kennedy, 31 and a graduate of the University of Vermont, is an options trader at William B. Maher Associates on the American Stock Exchange.
